pyqt5.stylesheet: /* ========================== TEMA: Light (Metso Corporate) ========================== */ QMainWindow { background-color: #F8FAFC; } QWidget { background-color: #F8FAFC; color: #000000; font-family: 'Inter', 'Segoe UI', sans-serif; font-size: 13px; } /* ========== TABS ========== */ QTabWidget::pane { border: 1px solid #CBD5E1; border-radius: 8px; background-color: #FFFFFF; } QTabBar::tab { background-color: #F1F5F9; color: #475569; padding: 12px 20px; border: 1px solid #CBD5E1; border-bottom: none; border-top-left-radius: 4px; border-top-right-radius: 4px; font-weight: 600; min-width: 120px; } QTabBar::tab:hover { background-color: rgba(235, 40, 20, 0.08); color: #EB2814; } QTabBar::tab:selected { background-color: #FFFFFF; color: #EB2814; border-bottom: 3px solid #EB2814; } /* ========== GROUP BOX ========== */ QGroupBox { background-color: #FFFFFF; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0; border-radius: 8px; margin-top: 10px; padding: 15px; font-weight: 600; } QGroupBox::title { subcontrol-origin: margin; subcontrol-position: top left; padding: 0 5px; color: #EB2814; font-size: 16px; } /* ========== BUTTONS ========== */ QPushButton { background-color: #EB2814; color: #FFFFFF; border: 2px solid #EB2814; border-radius: 4px; padding: 8px 20px; font-weight: 600; font-size: 13px; text-transform: uppercase; } QPushButton:hover { background-color: #C11E0F; border-color: #C11E0F; } QPushButton:pressed { background-color: #9A180C; } QPushButton[buttonStyle="secondary"] { background-color: transparent; color: #EB2814; border: 2px solid #EB2814; } QPushButton[buttonStyle="secondary"]:hover { background-color: #EB2814; color: #FFFFFF; } /* ========== LINE EDIT ========== */ QLineEdit { background-color: #FFFFFF; border: 2px solid #CBD5E1; border-radius: 4px; padding: 8px 12px; color: #000000; selection-background-color: #EB2814; selection-color: #FFFFFF; } QLineEdit:focus { border-color: #EB2814; } /* ========== PROGRESS BAR ========== */ QProgressBar { background-color: #F1F5F9; border: 2px solid #CBD5E1; border-radius: 4px; text-align: center; height: 24px; color: #000000; font-weight: 600; } QProgressBar::chunk { background: qlineargradient( x1:0, y1:0, x2:1, y2:0, stop:0 #EB2814, stop:1 #C11E0F ); border-radius: 2px; } /* ========== LABELS ========== */ QLabel[labelStyle="title"] { font-size: 24px; font-weight: 700; color: #EB2814; } /* ========== SCROLL BAR ========== */ QScrollBar::handle:vertical, QScrollBar::handle:horizontal { background-color: #EB2814; border-radius: 5px; } /* ========== CHECKBOX & RADIO ========== */ QCheckBox::indicator:checked, QRadioButton::indicator:checked { background-color: #EB2814; border-color: #EB2814; } /* ========== TEXT EDIT (Log Console) ========== */ QTextEdit { background-color: #FFFFFF; color: #000000; border: 1px solid #CBD5E1; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Consolas', 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 12px; } /* ========== MENU BAR ========== */ QMenuBar::item:selected { background-color: #EB2814; color: #FFFFFF; }
